project.description: Build and push backend Docker image to ECR

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd backend docker build -t nikhiltravelmemory-backend . aws ecr get-login-password --region ca-central-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $(aws sts get-caller-identity --query 'Account' --output text).dkr.ecr.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com docker tag nikhiltravelmemory-backend:latest $(aws sts get-caller-identity --query 'Account' --output text).dkr.ecr.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/nikhiltravelmemory-backend:latest docker push $(aws sts get-caller-identity --query 'Account' --output text).dkr.ecr.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/nikhiltravelmemory-backend:latest
